column4: where can i get instructions on getting metacity's composite manager running with dapper 6.06b2?
also: has anybody experienced a flickering animated mouse cursor when using the latest nvidia driver?
no, but you don't want to see the flickering I get with xgl + gnome-screensavers
dunno.. I wasn't having much luck with the latest builds but I got some good tips on #ubuntu-xgl yesterday.. now it's sweet (again..)
